languages.text: "Тебе больно, и ты причиняешь себе еще большую боль, чтобы забыться. Раны надо лечить, а не открывать их сильнее".
"You are in pain, and you are hurting yourself even more to block it all out. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."
languages.original_text: "Тебе больно, и ты причиняешь себе еще большую боль, чтобы забыться. Раны надо лечить, а не открывать их сильнее".

traits.locale_text: "You were hurt, and so you are hurting yourself even worse to forget the injustice. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."
"You were hurt, and so you are hurting yourself even worse to forget the injustice. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."
"You were hurt, and so now, you are hurting yourself even more so you can forget the injustice. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."
"You were hurt, and so now, you are hurting yourself even more so you can forget the injustice. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."
"You are in pain, and you are hurting yourself even more to block it all out. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."
"You are in pain, and you are hurting yourself even more to block it all out. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."

languages.text: 「君は苦しんでいる。そして、その痛みを感じまいとして、さらに自分自身を傷つけているんだ。傷は癒やすものであって、さらに広げるものではないよ」
languages.original_text: "You are in pain, and you are hurting yourself even more to block it all out. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."

traits.locale_text: 「君は苦しんでいる。そして、その痛みを感じまいとして、さらに自分自身を傷つけているんだ。傷は癒やすものであって、さらに広げるものではないよ」

languages.text: "Ihr empfindet Schmerzen und fügt Euch selbst noch welche zu, um das alles zu blockieren. Wunden müssen geheilt werden, nicht weiter aufgerissen."
languages.original_text: "You are in pain, and you are hurting yourself even more to block it all out. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr empfindet Schmerzen und fügt Euch selbst noch welche zu, um das alles zu blockieren. Wunden müssen geheilt werden, nicht weiter aufgerissen."

languages.text: « Vous souffrez, et vous vous faites encore plus de mal en tentant de réprimer ces sentiments. Si l'on veut guérir, rien ne sert de rouvrir ses blessures, il faut les soigner. »
languages.original_text: "You are in pain, and you are hurting yourself even more to block it all out. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."

traits.locale_text: « Vous souffrez, et vous vous faites encore plus de mal en tentant de réprimer ces sentiments. Si l'on veut guérir, rien ne sert de rouvrir ses blessures, il faut les soigner. »

languages.text: «Está herido, y si ignora el dolor solo empeora la situación. Las heridas hay que sanarlas, no abrirlas aún más».
languages.original_text: "You are in pain, and you are hurting yourself even more to block it all out. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."

traits.locale_text: «Está herido, y si ignora el dolor solo empeora la situación. Las heridas hay que sanarlas, no abrirlas aún más».

languages.text: “你很痛苦，而你为了不再感到痛苦，正在伤害自己。你需要让伤口愈合，不是把它进一步撕开。”
languages.original_text: "You are in pain, and you are hurting yourself even more to block it all out. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."

traits.locale_text: “你很痛苦，而你为了不再感到痛苦，正在伤害自己。你需要让伤口愈合，不是把它进一步撕开。”

languages.text: "Acı içindesin ve tüm bunları engellemek için kendine daha da fazla zarar veriyorsun. Yaralara yapılması gereken; onları iyileştirmektir, daha da açmak değil."
languages.original_text: "You are in pain, and you are hurting yourself even more to block it all out. Wounds need to be healed, not opened up further."

traits.locale_text: "Acı içindesin ve tüm bunları engellemek için kendine daha da fazla zarar veriyorsun. Yaralara yapılması gereken onları iyileştirmektir, daha da fazla açmak değil."
